30 private enum LayerVisibility
31 {
32 Visible,
33 Invisible
34 }
35
36 private enum LayerLinkage
37 {
38 Unlinked,
39 Linked
40 }
41
42 private readonly struct LayerData
43 {
44 public readonly LayerVisibility Visible;
45 public readonly LayerLinkage Linkage;
46
47 public static readonly LayerData Default = new LayerData(LayerVisibility.Visible, LayerLinkage.Unlinked);
48
49 public LayerData(LayerVisibility visible, LayerLinkage linkage)
50 {
51 Visible = visible;
52 Linkage = linkage;
53 }
54
55 public void Deconstruct(out LayerVisibility isvisible, out LayerLinkage islinked)
56 {
57 isvisible = Visible;
58 islinked = Linkage;
59 }
60 }

243 private static string GetSubDescription()
244 {
245 if (MainSub?.Info != null)
246 {
247 LocalizedString localizedDescription = TextManager.Get($"submarine.description.{MainSub.Info.Name ?? ""}");
248 if (!localizedDescription.IsNullOrEmpty()) { return localizedDescription.Value; }
249 return MainSub.Info.Description?.Value ?? "";
250 }
251 return "";
252 }
253
254 private static LocalizedString GetTotalHullVolume()
255 {
256 return $"{TextManager.Get("TotalHullVolume")}:\n{Hull.HullList.Sum(h => h.Volume)}";
257 }
258
259 private static LocalizedString GetSelectedHullVolume()
260 {
261 float buoyancyVol = 0.0f;
262 float selectedVol = 0.0f;
263 float neutralPercentage = SubmarineBody.NeutralBallastPercentage;
264 Hull.HullList.ForEach(h =>
265 {
266 buoyancyVol += h.Volume;
267 if (h.IsSelected)
268 {
269 selectedVol += h.Volume;
270 }
271 });
272 buoyancyVol *= neutralPercentage;
273 string retVal = $"{TextManager.Get("SelectedHullVolume")}:\n{selectedVol}";
274 if (selectedVol > 0.0f && buoyancyVol > 0.0f)
275 {
276 if (buoyancyVol / selectedVol < 1.0f)
277 {
278 retVal += $" ({TextManager.GetWithVariable("OptimalBallastLevel", "[value]", (buoyancyVol / selectedVol).ToString("0.0000"))})";
279 }
280 else
281 {
282 retVal += $" ({TextManager.Get("InsufficientBallast")})";
283 }
284 }
285 return retVal;
286 }

445 List<(string Name, SubmarineInfo Sub)> subs = new List<(string Name, SubmarineInfo Sub)>();
446
447 foreach (SubmarineInfo sub in SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines)
448 {
449 if (sub.Type != SubmarineType.Player) { continue; }
450 subs.Add((sub.Name, sub));
451 }
452
453 foreach (var (name, sub) in subs.OrderBy(tuple => tuple.Name))

455 linkedSubBox.AddItem(name, sub);

568 ScrollBarVisible = true,
569 AutoHideScrollBar = false,
570 OnSelected = (component, o) =>
571 {
572 if (GUI.MouseOn is GUITickBox) { return false; } // lol
573 if (!(o is string layer)) { return false; }
574
575 MapEntity.SelectedList.Clear();
576 foreach (MapEntity entity in MapEntity.mapEntityList.Where(me => !me.Removed && me.Layer == layer))
577 {
578 if (entity.IsSelected) { continue; }
579
580 MapEntity.SelectedList.Add(entity);
581 }
582 return true;
583 }

629 Vector2 subPanelSize = new Vector2(0.925f, 0.9f);
630
631 undoBufferPanel = new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.15f, 0.2f), GUI.Canvas) { MinSize = new Point(200, 200) })
632 {
633 Visible = false
634 };
635
636 undoBufferList = new GUIListBox(new RectTransform(subPanelSize, undoBufferPanel.RectTransform, Anchor.Center))
637 {
638 ScrollBarVisible = true,
639 OnSelected = (_, userData) =>
640 {
641 int index;
642 if (userData is Command command)
643 {
644 index = Commands.IndexOf(command);
645 }
646 else
647 {
648 index = -1;
649 }
650
651 int diff = index- commandIndex;
652 int amount = Math.Abs(diff);
653
654 if (diff >= 0)
655 {
656 Redo(amount + 1);
657 }
658 else
659 {
660 Undo(amount - 1);
661 }
662
663 return true;
664 }
665 };

1017 private bool TestSubmarine(GUIButton button, object obj)
1018 {
1019 List<LocalizedString> errorMsgs = new List<LocalizedString>();
1020
1021 if (!Hull.HullList.Any())
1022 {
1023 errorMsgs.Add(TextManager.Get("NoHullsWarning"));
1024 }
1025
1026 if (!WayPoint.WayPointList.Any(wp => wp.ShouldBeSaved && wp.SpawnType == SpawnType.Human))
1027 {
1028 errorMsgs.Add(TextManager.Get("NoHumanSpawnpointWarning"));
1029 }
1030
1031 if (errorMsgs.Any())
1032 {
1033 new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("Error"), LocalizedString.Join("\n\n", errorMsgs), new Vector2(0.25f, 0.0f), new Point(400, 200));
1034 return true;
1035 }
1036
1037 GameMain.LuaCs.Initialize();
1038
1039 CloseItem();
1040
1041 backedUpSubInfo = new SubmarineInfo(MainSub);
1042
1043 GameMain.GameScreen.Select();
1044
1045 GameSession gameSession = new GameSession(backedUpSubInfo, "", GameModePreset.TestMode, CampaignSettings.Empty, null);
1046 gameSession.StartRound(null, false);
1047
1048 (gameSession.GameMode as TestGameMode).OnRoundEnd = () =>
1049 {
1050 Submarine.Unload();
1051 GameMain.SubEditorScreen.Select();
1052 };
1053
1054 return true;
1055 }

1058 {
1059 backedUpSubInfo = null;
1060 }
1061
1062 private void UpdateEntityList()
1063 {
1064 categorizedEntityList.Content.ClearChildren();
1065 allEntityList.Content.ClearChildren();
1066
1067 int maxTextWidth = (int)(GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont.MeasureString(TextManager.Get("mapentitycategory.misc")).X + GUI.IntScale(50));
1068 Dictionary<string, List<MapEntityPrefab>> entityLists = new Dictionary<string, List<MapEntityPrefab>>();
1069 Dictionary<string, MapEntityCategory> categoryKeys = new Dictionary<string, MapEntityCategory>();
1070
1071 foreach (MapEntityCategory category in Enum.GetValues(typeof(MapEntityCategory)))
1072 {
1073 LocalizedString categoryName = TextManager.Get("MapEntityCategory." + category);
1074 maxTextWidth = (int)Math.Max(maxTextWidth, GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont.MeasureString(categoryName.Replace(" ", "\n")).X + GUI.IntScale(50));
1075 foreach (MapEntityPrefab ep in MapEntityPrefab.List)
1076 {
1077 if (!ep.Category.HasFlag(category)) { continue; }
1078
1079 if (!entityLists.ContainsKey(category + ep.Subcategory))
1080 {
1081 entityLists[category + ep.Subcategory] = new List<MapEntityPrefab>();
1082 }
1083 entityLists[category + ep.Subcategory].Add(ep);
1084 categoryKeys[category + ep.Subcategory] = category;
1085 LocalizedString subcategoryName = TextManager.Get("subcategory." + ep.Subcategory).Fallback(ep.Subcategory);
1086 if (subcategoryName != null)
1087 {
1088 maxTextWidth = (int)Math.Max(maxTextWidth, GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont.MeasureString(subcategoryName.Replace(" ", "\n")).X + GUI.IntScale(50));
1089 }
1090 }
1091 }
1092
1093 categorizedEntityList.Content.ClampMouseRectToParent = true;
1094 int entitiesPerRow = (int)Math.Ceiling(categorizedEntityList.Content.Rect.Width / Math.Max(125 * GUI.Scale, 60));
1095 foreach (string categoryKey in entityLists.Keys)
1096 {
1097 var categoryFrame = new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(Vector2.One, categorizedEntityList.Content.RectTransform), style: null)
1098 {
1099 ClampMouseRectToParent = true,
1100 UserData = categoryKeys[categoryKey]
1101 };
1102
1103 new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(Vector2.One, categoryFrame.RectTransform), style: "HorizontalLine");
1104
1105 LocalizedString categoryName = TextManager.Get("MapEntityCategory." + entityLists[categoryKey].First().Category);
1106 LocalizedString subCategoryName = entityLists[categoryKey].First().Subcategory;
1107 if (subCategoryName.IsNullOrEmpty())
1108 {
1109 new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Point(maxTextWidth, categoryFrame.Rect.Height), categoryFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.TopLeft),
1110 categoryName, textAlignment: Alignment.TopLeft, font: GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont, wrap: true)
1111 {
1112 Padding = new Vector4(GUI.IntScale(10))
1113 };
1114
1115 }
1116 else
1117 {
1118 subCategoryName = subCategoryName.IsNullOrEmpty() ?
1119 TextManager.Get("mapentitycategory.misc") :
1120 (TextManager.Get($"subcategory.{subCategoryName}").Fallback(subCategoryName));
1121 var categoryTitle = new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Point(maxTextWidth, categoryFrame.Rect.Height), categoryFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.TopLeft),
1122 categoryName, textAlignment: Alignment.TopLeft, font: GUIStyle.Font, wrap: true)
1123 {
1124 Padding = new Vector4(GUI.IntScale(10))
1125 };
1126 new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Point(maxTextWidth, categoryFrame.Rect.Height), categoryFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.TopLeft) { AbsoluteOffset = new Point(0, (int)(categoryTitle.TextSize.Y + GUI.IntScale(10))) },
1127 subCategoryName, textAlignment: Alignment.TopLeft, font: GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont, wrap: true)
1128 {
1129 Padding = new Vector4(GUI.IntScale(10))
1130 };
1131 }
1132
1133 var entityListInner = new GUIListBox(new RectTransform(new Point(categoryFrame.Rect.Width - maxTextWidth, categoryFrame.Rect.Height), categoryFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.CenterRight),
1134 style: null,
1135 useMouseDownToSelect: true)
1136 {
1137 ScrollBarVisible = false,
1138 AutoHideScrollBar = false,
1139 OnSelected = SelectPrefab,
1140 UseGridLayout = true,
1141 CheckSelected = MapEntityPrefab.GetSelected,
1142 ClampMouseRectToParent = true
1143 };
1144 entityListInner.ContentBackground.ClampMouseRectToParent = true;
1145 entityListInner.Content.ClampMouseRectToParent = true;
1146
1147 foreach (MapEntityPrefab ep in entityLists[categoryKey])
1148 {
1149#if !DEBUG
1150 if (ep.HideInMenus) { continue; }
1151#endif
1152 CreateEntityElement(ep, entitiesPerRow, entityListInner.Content);
1153 }
1154
1155 entityListInner.UpdateScrollBarSize();
1156 int contentHeight = (int)(entityListInner.TotalSize + entityListInner.Padding.Y + entityListInner.Padding.W);
1157 categoryFrame.RectTransform.NonScaledSize = new Point(categoryFrame.Rect.Width, contentHeight);
1158 categoryFrame.RectTransform.MinSize = new Point(0, contentHeight);
1159 entityListInner.RectTransform.NonScaledSize = new Point(entityListInner.Rect.Width, contentHeight);
1160 entityListInner.RectTransform.MinSize = new Point(0, contentHeight);
1161
1162 entityListInner.Content.RectTransform.SortChildren((i1, i2) =>
1163 string.Compare(((MapEntityPrefab)i1.GUIComponent.UserData)?.Name.Value, (i2.GUIComponent.UserData as MapEntityPrefab)?.Name.Value, StringComparison.Ordinal));
1164 }
1165
1166 foreach (MapEntityPrefab ep in MapEntityPrefab.List)
1167 {
1168#if !DEBUG
1169 if (ep.HideInMenus) { continue; }
1170#endif
1171 CreateEntityElement(ep, entitiesPerRow, allEntityList.Content);
1172 }
1173 allEntityList.Content.RectTransform.SortChildren((i1, i2) =>
1174 string.Compare(((MapEntityPrefab)i1.GUIComponent.UserData)?.Name.Value, (i2.GUIComponent.UserData as MapEntityPrefab)?.Name.Value, StringComparison.Ordinal));
1175
1176 }
1177
1178 private void CreateEntityElement(MapEntityPrefab ep, int entitiesPerRow, GUIComponent parent)
1179 {
1180 bool legacy = ep.Category.HasFlag(MapEntityCategory.Legacy);
1181
1182 float relWidth = 1.0f / entitiesPerRow;
1183 GUIFrame frame = new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(
1184 new Vector2(relWidth, relWidth * ((float)parent.Rect.Width / parent.Rect.Height)),
1185 parent.RectTransform)
1186 { MinSize = new Point(0, 50) },
1187 style: "GUITextBox")
1188 {
1189 UserData = ep,
1190 ClampMouseRectToParent = true
1191 };
1192 frame.RectTransform.MinSize = new Point(0, frame.Rect.Width);
1193 frame.RectTransform.MaxSize = new Point(int.MaxValue, frame.Rect.Width);
1194
1195 LocalizedString name = legacy ? TextManager.GetWithVariable("legacyitemformat", "[name]", ep.Name) : ep.Name;
1196 frame.ToolTip = ep.Description.IsNullOrEmpty() ? name : name + '\n' + ep.Description;
1197
1198 if (ep.ContentPackage != GameMain.VanillaContent && ep.ContentPackage != null)
1199 {
1200 frame.Color = Color.Magenta;
1201 frame.ToolTip = RichString.Rich($"{frame.ToolTip}\n‖color:{XMLExtensions.ToStringHex(Color.MediumPurple)}‖{ep.ContentPackage?.Name}‖color:end‖");
1202 }
1203 if (ep.HideInMenus)
1204 {
1205 frame.Color = Color.Red;
1206 name = "[HIDDEN] " + name;
1207 }
1208

1210 {
1211 Stretch = true,
1212 RelativeSpacing = 0.03f,
1213 CanBeFocused = false
1214 };
1215
1216 Sprite icon = ep.Sprite;
1217 Color iconColor = Color.White;
1218 if (ep is ItemPrefab itemPrefab)
1219 {
1220 if (itemPrefab.InventoryIcon != null)
1221 {
1222 icon = itemPrefab.InventoryIcon;
1223 iconColor = itemPrefab.InventoryIconColor;
1224 }
1225 else
1226 {
1227 iconColor = itemPrefab.SpriteColor;
1228 }
1229 }

1231 if (ep.Sprite != null)
1232 {
1233 img = new GUIImage(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.8f),
1234 paddedFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.TopCenter), icon)
1235 {
1236 CanBeFocused = false,
1237 LoadAsynchronously = true,
1238 SpriteEffects = icon.effects,
1239 Color = legacy ? iconColor * 0.6f : iconColor
1240 };
1241 }
1242
1243 if (ep is ItemAssemblyPrefab itemAssemblyPrefab)
1244 {
1245 new GUICustomComponent(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.75f),
1246 paddedFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.TopCenter), onDraw: (sb, customComponent) =>
1247 {
1248 if (GUIImage.LoadingTextures) { return; }
1249 itemAssemblyPrefab.DrawIcon(sb, customComponent);
1250 })
1251 {
1252 HideElementsOutsideFrame = true,
1253 ToolTip = frame.ToolTip.SanitizedString
1254 };
1255 }
1256
1257 GUITextBlock textBlock = new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.0f), paddedFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.BottomCenter),
1258 text: name, textAlignment: Alignment.Center, font: GUIStyle.SmallFont)
1259 {
1260 CanBeFocused = false
1261 };
1262 if (legacy) { textBlock.TextColor *= 0.6f; }
1263 if (name.IsNullOrEmpty())
1264 {
1265 DebugConsole.AddWarning($"Entity \"{ep.Identifier.Value}\" has no name!");
1266 textBlock.Text = frame.ToolTip = ep.Identifier.Value;
1267 textBlock.TextColor = GUIStyle.Red;
1268 }
1269 textBlock.Text = ToolBox.LimitString(textBlock.Text, textBlock.Font, textBlock.Rect.Width);
1270
1271 if (ep.Category == MapEntityCategory.ItemAssembly
1272 && ep.ContentPackage?.Files.Length == 1
1273 && ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Contains(ep.ContentPackage))
1274 {
1275 var deleteButton = new GUIButton(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.2f), paddedFrame.RectTransform, Anchor.BottomCenter) { MinSize = new Point(0, 20) },
1276 TextManager.Get("Delete"), style: "GUIButtonSmall")
1277 {

1296 catch (Exception e)

1299 }
1300 return true;
1301 };
1302 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked += msgBox.Close;
1303 msgBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked += msgBox.Close;
1304 }

1306 return true;
1307 }

1309 }

1311 if (img != null)

1323 public void Select(bool enableAutoSave = true)
1324 {

1326
1327 base.Select();
1328
1329 GUI.PreventPauseMenuToggle = false;
1330 if (!Directory.Exists(autoSavePath))

1333 e.Attributes = System.IO.FileAttributes.Directory | System.IO.FileAttributes.Hidden;
1334 if (!e.Exists)
1335 {
1336 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to create auto save directory!");
1337 }
1338 }
1339
1340 if (!File.Exists(autoSaveInfoPath))
1341 {
1342 try
1343 {
1344 AutoSaveInfo = new XDocument(new XElement("AutoSaves"));

1346 }
1347 catch (Exception e)

1358 Level.Loaded?.GenerationParams?.AmbientLightColor ??

1360

1362

1364 if (!wasSelectedBefore)
1365 {
1366 OpenEntityMenu(null);
1367 wasSelectedBefore = true;
1368 }
1369
1370 if (backedUpSubInfo != null)
1371 {

1373 }

1376 if (backedUpSubInfo != null) { name = backedUpSubInfo.Name; }

1409

1439
1440 public override void OnFileDropped(string filePath, string extension)
1441 {
1442 switch (extension)
1443 {
1444 case ".sub": // Submarine
1445 SubmarineInfo info = new SubmarineInfo(filePath);
1446 if (info.IsFileCorrupted)
1447 {
1448 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Could not drag and drop the file. File \"{filePath}\" is corrupted!");
1449 info.Dispose();
1450 return;
1451 }
1452
1453 LocalizedString body = TextManager.GetWithVariable("SubEditor.LoadConfirmBody", "[submarine]", info.Name);
1454 GUI.AskForConfirmation(TextManager.Get("Load"), body, onConfirm: () => LoadSub(info), onDeny: () => info.Dispose());
1455 break;
1456
1457 case ".xml": // Item Assembly
1458 string text = File.ReadAllText(filePath);
1459 // PlayerInput.MousePosition doesn't update while the window is not active so we need to use this method
1460 Vector2 mousePos = Mouse.GetState().Position.ToVector2();
1461 PasteAssembly(text, cam.ScreenToWorld(mousePos));
1462 break;
1463
1464 case ".png": // submarine preview
1465 case ".jpg":
1466 case ".jpeg":
1467 if (saveFrame == null) { break; }
1468
1469 Texture2D texture = Sprite.LoadTexture(filePath, compress: false);
1470 previewImage.Sprite = new Sprite(texture, null, null);
1471 if (MainSub != null)
1472 {
1473 MainSub.Info.PreviewImage = previewImage.Sprite;
1474 }
1475
1476 break;
1477
1478 default:
1479 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Could not drag and drop the file. \"{extension}\" is not a valid file extension! (expected .xml, .sub, .png or .jpg)");
1480 break;
1481 }
1482 }
1483
1489 private static IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> AutoSaveCoroutine()
1490 {
1491 DateTime target = DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(GameSettings.CurrentConfig.AutoSaveIntervalSeconds);
1492 DateTime tempTarget = DateTime.Now;
1493
1494 bool wasPaused = false;
1495
1496 while (DateTime.Now < target && Selected is SubEditorScreen || GameMain.Instance.Paused || wasPaused)
1497 {
1498 if (GameMain.Instance.Paused && !wasPaused)
1499 {
1500 AutoSave();
1501 tempTarget = DateTime.Now;
1502 wasPaused = true;
1503 }
1504
1505 if (!GameMain.Instance.Paused && wasPaused)
1506 {
1507 wasPaused = false;
1508 target = target.AddSeconds((DateTime.Now - tempTarget).TotalSeconds);
1509 }
1510 yield return CoroutineStatus.Running;
1511 }
1512
1513 if (Selected is SubEditorScreen)
1514 {
1515 AutoSave();
1516 CoroutineManager.StartCoroutine(AutoSaveCoroutine(), "SubEditorAutoSave");
1517 }
1518 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
1519 }

1591 {

1600 Character.Controlled = dummyCharacter;

1603
1609 private static void AutoSave()
1610 {
1611 if (MapEntity.mapEntityList.Any() && GameSettings.CurrentConfig.EnableSubmarineAutoSave && !isAutoSaving)
1612 {
1613 if (MainSub != null)
1614 {
1615 isAutoSaving = true;
1616 if (!Directory.Exists(autoSavePath)) { return; }
1617
1618 XDocument doc = new XDocument(new XElement("Submarine"));
1619 MainSub.SaveToXElement(doc.Root);
1620 Thread saveThread = new Thread(start =>
1621 {
1622 try
1623 {
1624 Barotrauma.IO.Validation.SkipValidationInDebugBuilds = true;
1625 TimeSpan time = DateTime.UtcNow - DateTime.MinValue;
1626 string filePath = Path.Combine(autoSavePath, $"AutoSave_{(ulong)time.TotalMilliseconds}.sub");
1627 SaveUtil.CompressStringToFile(filePath, doc.ToString());
1628
1629 CrossThread.RequestExecutionOnMainThread(() =>
1630 {
1631 if (AutoSaveInfo?.Root == null || MainSub?.Info == null) { return; }
1632
1633 int saveCount = AutoSaveInfo.Root.Elements().Count();
1634 while (AutoSaveInfo.Root.Elements().Count() > maxAutoSaves)
1635 {
1636 XElement min = AutoSaveInfo.Root.Elements().OrderBy(element => element.GetAttributeUInt64("time", 0)).FirstOrDefault();
1637 #warning TODO: revise
1638 string path = min.GetAttributeStringUnrestricted("file", "");
1639 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(path)) { continue; }
1640
1641 if (IO.File.Exists(path)) { IO.File.Delete(path); }
1642 min?.Remove();
1643 }
1644
1645 XElement newElement = new XElement("AutoSave",
1646 new XAttribute("file", filePath),
1647 new XAttribute("name", MainSub.Info.Name),
1648 new XAttribute("time", (ulong)time.TotalSeconds));
1649 AutoSaveInfo.Root.Add(newElement);
1650
1651 try
1652 {
1653 IO.SafeXML.SaveSafe(AutoSaveInfo, autoSaveInfoPath);
1654 }
1655 catch (Exception e)
1656 {
1657 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Saving auto save info to \"" + autoSaveInfoPath + "\" failed!", e);
1658 }
1659 });
1660
1661 Barotrauma.IO.Validation.SkipValidationInDebugBuilds = false;
1662 CrossThread.RequestExecutionOnMainThread(DisplayAutoSavePrompt);
1663 }
1664 catch (Exception e)
1665 {
1666 CrossThread.RequestExecutionOnMainThread(() => DebugConsole.ThrowError("Auto saving submarine failed!", e));
1667 }
1668 isAutoSaving = false;
1669 }) { Name = "Auto Save Thread" };
1670 saveThread.Start();
1671 }
1672 }
1673 }

1676 {
1677 if (Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen) { return; }
1678 autoSaveLabel?.Parent?.RemoveChild(autoSaveLabel);
1679
1680 LocalizedString label = TextManager.Get("AutoSaved");
1681 autoSaveLabel = new GUILayoutGroup(new RectTransform(new Point(GUI.IntScale(150), GUI.IntScale(32)), GameMain.SubEditorScreen.EntityMenu.RectTransform, Anchor.TopRight)
1682 {
1683 ScreenSpaceOffset = new Point(-GUI.IntScale(16), -GUI.IntScale(48))
1684 }, isHorizontal: true)
1685 {
1686 CanBeFocused = false
1687 };
1688
1689 GUIImage checkmark = new GUIImage(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.25f, 1f), autoSaveLabel.RectTransform), style: "MissionCompletedIcon", scaleToFit: true);
1690 GUITextBlock labelComponent = new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.75f, 1f), autoSaveLabel.RectTransform), label, font: GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont, color: GUIStyle.Green)
1691 {
1692 Padding = Vector4.Zero,
1693 AutoScaleHorizontal = true,
1694 AutoScaleVertical = true
1695 };
1696
1697 labelComponent.FadeOut(0.5f, true, 1f);
1698 checkmark.FadeOut(0.5f, true, 1f);
1699 autoSaveLabel?.FadeOut(0.5f, true, 1f);
1700 }

1702 private bool SaveSub(GUIButton button, object obj)
1703 {
1704 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(nameBox.Text))
1705 {
1706 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.Get("SubNameMissingWarning"), GUIStyle.Red);
1707 nameBox.Flash();
1708 return false;
1709 }
1710
1711 if (MainSub.Info.Type != SubmarineType.Player)
1712 {
1713 if (MainSub.Info.Type == SubmarineType.OutpostModule &&
1714 MainSub.Info.OutpostModuleInfo != null)
1715 {
1716 MainSub.Info.PreviewImage = null;
1717 }
1718 }
1719 else if (MainSub.Info.SubmarineClass == SubmarineClass.Undefined && !MainSub.Info.HasTag(SubmarineTag.Shuttle))
1720 {
1721 var msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("warning"), TextManager.Get("undefinedsubmarineclasswarning"), new LocalizedString[] { TextManager.Get("yes"), TextManager.Get("no") });
1722
1723 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked = (bt, userdata) =>
1724 {
1725 SaveSubToFile(nameBox.Text);
1726 saveFrame = null;
1727 msgBox.Close();
1728 return true;
1729 };
1730 msgBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked = (bt, userdata) =>
1731 {
1732 msgBox.Close();
1733 return true;
1734 };
1735 return true;
1736 }
1737
1738 var result = SaveSubToFile(nameBox.Text);
1739 saveFrame = null;
1740 return result;
1741 }

1743 private readonly Queue<ContentPackage> packageReloadQueue = new Queue<ContentPackage>();
1744
1745 private void EnqueueForReload(ContentPackage p)
1746 {
1747 if (p is null) { return; }
1748 if (!packageReloadQueue.Contains(p)) { packageReloadQueue.Enqueue(p); }
1749 }
1750
1751 public static Type DetermineSubFileType(SubmarineType type)
1752 => type switch
1753 {
1754 SubmarineType.Outpost => typeof(OutpostFile),
1755 SubmarineType.OutpostModule => typeof(OutpostModuleFile),
1756 SubmarineType.Ruin => typeof(OutpostModuleFile),
1757 SubmarineType.Wreck => typeof(WreckFile),
1758 SubmarineType.BeaconStation => typeof(BeaconStationFile),
1759 SubmarineType.EnemySubmarine => typeof(EnemySubmarineFile),
1760 SubmarineType.Player => typeof(SubmarineFile),
1761 _ => null
1762 };
1763
1764 private bool SaveSubToFile(string name)
1765 {
1766 bool canModifyPackage(ContentPackage p)
1767 => p != null && ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Contains(p) && p != ContentPackageManager.VanillaCorePackage;
1768
1769 Type subFileType = DetermineSubFileType(MainSub?.Info.Type ?? SubmarineType.Player);
1770
1771 void addSubAndSaveModProject(ModProject modProject, string filePath, string packagePath)
1772 {
1773 filePath = filePath.CleanUpPath();
1774 packagePath = packagePath.CleanUpPath();
1775 string packageDir = Path.GetDirectoryName(packagePath).CleanUpPathCrossPlatform(correctFilenameCase: false);
1776 if (filePath.StartsWith(packageDir))
1777 {
1778 filePath = $"{ContentPath.ModDirStr}/{filePath[packageDir.Length..]}";
1779 }
1780 if (!modProject.Files.Any(f => f.Type == subFileType &&
1781 f.Path == filePath))
1782 {
1783 var newFile = ModProject.File.FromPath(filePath, subFileType);
1784 modProject.AddFile(newFile);
1785 }
1786
1787 modProject.DiscardHashAndInstallTime();
1788 modProject.Save(packagePath);
1789 }
1790
1791 if (!GameMain.DebugDraw)
1792 {
1793 if (Submarine.GetLightCount() > MaxLights)
1794 {
1795 new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("error"), TextManager.GetWithVariable("subeditor.lightcounterror", "[max]", MaxShadowCastingLights.ToString()));
1796 return false;
1797 }
1798
1799 if (Submarine.GetShadowCastingLightCount() > MaxShadowCastingLights)
1800 {
1801 new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("error"), TextManager.GetWithVariable("subeditor.shadowcastinglightcounterror", "[max]", MaxShadowCastingLights.ToString()));
1802 return false;
1803 }
1804 }
1805
1806 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(name))
1807 {
1808 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.Get("SubNameMissingWarning"), GUIStyle.Red);
1809 return false;
1810 }
1811
1812 foreach (var illegalChar in Path.GetInvalidFileNameChars())
1813 {
1814 if (!name.Contains(illegalChar)) { continue; }
1815 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.GetWithVariable("SubNameIllegalCharsWarning", "[illegalchar]", illegalChar.ToString()), GUIStyle.Red);
1816 return false;
1817 }
1818
1819 name = name.Trim();
1820
1821 string newLocalModDir = $"{ContentPackage.LocalModsDir}/{name}";
1822
1823 var vanilla = GameMain.VanillaContent;
1824 var vanillaSubs = vanilla?.GetFiles<BaseSubFile>()?.Select(f => f.Path);
1825 bool isVanillaSub = vanillaSubs?.Any(f => f.Value == MainSub.Info.FilePath.CleanUpPath()) ?? false;
1826
1827 string savePath = name + ".sub";
1828 string prevSavePath = null;
1829 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(MainSub?.Info.FilePath) &&
1830 MainSub.Info.Name.Equals(name, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
1831 {
1832 prevSavePath = MainSub.Info.FilePath.CleanUpPath();
1833 string prevDir = Path.GetDirectoryName(MainSub.Info.FilePath).CleanUpPath();
1834 string[] subDirs = prevDir.Split('/');
1835
1836 ModProject modProject = new ModProject() { Name = name };
1837 string fileListPath = null;
1838
1839 if (subDirs.Length > 1 && subDirs[0].Equals(ContentPackage.LocalModsDir, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
1840 {
1841 string modName = subDirs[1];
1842 ContentPackage contentPackage = ContentPackageManager.EnabledPackages.All.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name.Equals(modName, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase));
1843 if (contentPackage != null)
1844 {
1845 modProject = new ModProject(contentPackage);
1846 fileListPath = contentPackage.Path;
1847 EnqueueForReload(contentPackage);
1848 }
1849 }
1850
1851 savePath = Path.Combine(prevDir, savePath).CleanUpPath();
1852 if (!isVanillaSub)
1853 {
1854 addSubAndSaveModProject(modProject, savePath, fileListPath ?? Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(savePath), ContentPackage.FileListFileName));
1855 }
1856 }
1857 else
1858 {
1859 savePath = Path.Combine(newLocalModDir, savePath);
1860 ModProject modProject = new ModProject() { Name = name };
1861 addSubAndSaveModProject(modProject, savePath, Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(savePath), ContentPackage.FileListFileName));
1862 }
1863 savePath = savePath.CleanUpPathCrossPlatform(correctFilenameCase: false);
1864
1865#if !DEBUG
1866 if (vanilla != null)
1867 {
1868 string pathToCompare = savePath.Replace(@"\", @"/");
1869 if (vanillaSubs.Any(sub => sub.Value.Replace(@"\", @"/").Equals(pathToCompare, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)))
1870 {
1871 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.Get("CannotEditVanillaSubs"), GUIStyle.Red, font: GUIStyle.LargeFont);
1872 return false;
1873 }
1874 }
1875#endif
1876
1877 if (MainSub != null)
1878 {
1879 Barotrauma.IO.Validation.SkipValidationInDebugBuilds = true;
1880 if (previewImage?.Sprite?.Texture != null && !previewImage.Sprite.Texture.IsDisposed && MainSub.Info.Type != SubmarineType.OutpostModule)
1881 {
1882 bool savePreviewImage = true;
1883 using System.IO.MemoryStream imgStream = new System.IO.MemoryStream();
1884 try
1885 {
1886 previewImage.Sprite.Texture.SaveAsPng(imgStream, previewImage.Sprite.Texture.Width, previewImage.Sprite.Texture.Height);
1887 }
1888 catch (Exception e)
1889 {
1890 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Saving the preview image of the submarine \"{MainSub.Info.Name}\" failed.", e);
1891 savePreviewImage = false;
1892 }
1893 MainSub.TrySaveAs(savePath, savePreviewImage ? imgStream : null);
1894 }
1895 else
1896 {
1897 MainSub.TrySaveAs(savePath);
1898 }
1899 Barotrauma.IO.Validation.SkipValidationInDebugBuilds = false;
1900
1901 MainSub.CheckForErrors();
1902
1903 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.GetWithVariable("SubSavedNotification", "[filepath]", savePath), GUIStyle.Green);
1904
1905 if (savePath.StartsWith(newLocalModDir))
1906 {
1907 ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Refresh();
1908 var newPackage = ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Path.StartsWith(newLocalModDir));
1909 if (newPackage is RegularPackage regular)
1910 {
1911 ContentPackageManager.EnabledPackages.EnableRegular(regular);
1912 GameSettings.SaveCurrentConfig();
1913 }
1914 }
1915 SubmarineInfo.RefreshSavedSub(savePath);
1916 if (prevSavePath != null && prevSavePath != savePath) { SubmarineInfo.RefreshSavedSub(prevSavePath); }
1917 MainSub.Info.PreviewImage = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.FilePath == savePath)?.PreviewImage;
1918
1919 string downloadFolder = Path.GetFullPath(SaveUtil.SubmarineDownloadFolder);
1920 linkedSubBox.ClearChildren();
1921 foreach (SubmarineInfo sub in SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines)
1922 {
1923 if (sub.Type != SubmarineType.Player) { continue; }
1924 if (Path.GetDirectoryName(Path.GetFullPath(sub.FilePath)) == downloadFolder) { continue; }
1925 linkedSubBox.AddItem(sub.Name, sub);
1926 }
1927 subNameLabel.Text = ToolBox.LimitString(MainSub.Info.Name, subNameLabel.Font, subNameLabel.Rect.Width);
1928 }
1929
1930 return false;
1931 }

2724 private List<Item> LoadItemAssemblyInventorySafe(ItemAssemblyPrefab assemblyPrefab)
2725 {
2726 var realItems = assemblyPrefab.CreateInstance(Vector2.Zero, MainSub);
2727 var itemInstance = new List<Item>();
2728 realItems.ForEach(entity =>
2729 {
2730 if (entity is Item it && it.ParentInventory == null)
2731 {
2732 itemInstance.Add(it);
2733 }
2734 });
2735 return itemInstance;
2736 }
2737
2738 private bool SaveAssembly(GUIButton button, object obj)
2739 {
2740 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(nameBox.Text))
2741 {
2742 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.Get("ItemAssemblyNameMissingWarning"), GUIStyle.Red);
2743
2744 nameBox.Flash();
2745 return false;
2746 }
2747
2748 foreach (char illegalChar in Path.GetInvalidFileNameChars())
2749 {
2750 if (nameBox.Text.Contains(illegalChar))
2751 {
2752 GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.GetWithVariable("ItemAssemblyNameIllegalCharsWarning", "[illegalchar]", illegalChar.ToString()), GUIStyle.Red);
2753 nameBox.Flash();
2754 return false;
2755 }
2756 }
2757
2758 bool hideInMenus = nameBox.Parent.GetChildByUserData("hideinmenus") is GUITickBox hideInMenusTickBox && hideInMenusTickBox.Selected;
2759 string saveFolder = Path.Combine(ContentPackage.LocalModsDir, nameBox.Text);
2760 string filePath = Path.Combine(saveFolder, $"{nameBox.Text}.xml").CleanUpPathCrossPlatform();
2761 if (File.Exists(filePath))
2762 {
2763 var msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("Warning"), TextManager.Get("ItemAssemblyFileExistsWarning"), new[] { TextManager.Get("Yes"), TextManager.Get("No") });
2764 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked = (btn, userdata) =>
2765 {
2766 msgBox.Close();
2767 Save();
2768 return true;
2769 };
2770 msgBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked = msgBox.Close;
2771 }
2772 else
2773 {
2774 var identifier = nameBox.Text.ToLowerInvariant().Replace(" ", "");
2775 var existingPrefab = MapEntityPrefab.Find(null, identifier, showErrorMessages: false);
2776 if (existingPrefab != null && System.IO.Path.GetDirectoryName(existingPrefab.FilePath.Value) == ItemAssemblyPrefab.VanillaSaveFolder)
2777 {
2778 var msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("Warning"), TextManager.Get("ItemAssemblyVanillaFileExistsWarning"));
2779 }
2780 else
2781 {
2782 Save();
2783 }
2784 }
2785
2786 void Save()
2787 {
2788 ContentPackage existingContentPackage = ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Regular.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Files.Any(f => f.Path == filePath));
2789 if (existingContentPackage == null)
2790 {
2791 //content package doesn't exist, create one
2792 ModProject modProject = new ModProject() { Name = nameBox.Text };
2793 var newFile = ModProject.File.FromPath<ItemAssemblyFile>(Path.Combine(ContentPath.ModDirStr, $"{nameBox.Text}.xml"));
2794 modProject.AddFile(newFile);
2795 string newPackagePath = ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.SaveRegularMod(modProject);
2796 existingContentPackage = ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.GetRegularModByPath(newPackagePath);
2797 }
2798
2799 XDocument doc = new XDocument(ItemAssemblyPrefab.Save(MapEntity.SelectedList.ToList(), nameBox.Text, descriptionBox.Text, hideInMenus));
2800 doc.SaveSafe(filePath);
2801
2802 var resultPackage = ContentPackageManager.ReloadContentPackage(existingContentPackage) as RegularPackage;
2803 if (!ContentPackageManager.EnabledPackages.Regular.Contains(resultPackage))
2804 {
2805 ContentPackageManager.EnabledPackages.EnableRegular(resultPackage);
2806 GameSettings.SaveCurrentConfig();
2807 }
2808
2809 UpdateEntityList();
2810 }
2811
2812 saveFrame = null;
2813 return false;
2814 }
2815
2816 private void SnapToGrid()
2817 {
2818 // First move components
2819 foreach (MapEntity e in MapEntity.SelectedList)
2820 {
2821 // Items snap to centre of nearest grid square
2822 Vector2 offset = e.Position;
2823 offset = new Vector2((MathF.Floor(offset.X / Submarine.GridSize.X) + .5f) * Submarine.GridSize.X - offset.X, (MathF.Floor(offset.Y / Submarine.GridSize.Y) + .5f) * Submarine.GridSize.Y - offset.Y);
2824 if (e is Item item)
2825 {
2826 var wire = item.GetComponent<Wire>();
2827 if (wire != null) { continue; }
2828 item.Move(offset);
2829 }
2830 else if (e is Structure structure)
2831 {
2832 structure.Move(offset);
2833 }
2834 }
2835
2836 // Then move wires, separated as moving components also moves the start and end node of wires
2837 foreach (Item item in MapEntity.SelectedList.Where(entity => entity is Item).Cast<Item>())
2838 {
2839 var wire = item.GetComponent<Wire>();
2840 if (wire != null)
2841 {
2842 for (int i = 0; i < wire.GetNodes().Count; i++)
2843 {
2844 // Items wire nodes to centre of nearest grid square
2845 Vector2 offset = wire.GetNodes()[i] + Submarine.MainSub.HiddenSubPosition;
2846 offset = new Vector2((MathF.Floor(offset.X / Submarine.GridSize.X) + .5f) * Submarine.GridSize.X - offset.X, (MathF.Floor(offset.Y / Submarine.GridSize.Y) + .5f) * Submarine.GridSize.Y - offset.Y);
2847 wire.MoveNode(i, offset);
2848 }
2849 }
2850 }
2851 }

3051 private void LoadAutoSave(object UserData)
3052 {
3053 if (!(UserData is XElement element)) { return; }
3054
3055 #warning TODO: revise
3056 string filePath = element.GetAttributeStringUnrestricted("file", "");
3057 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(filePath)) { return; }
3058
3059 var loadedSub = Submarine.Load(new SubmarineInfo(filePath), true);
3060
3061 // set the submarine file path to the "default" value
3062 var unspecifiedFileName = TextManager.Get("UnspecifiedSubFileName");
3063 loadedSub.Info.FilePath = Path.Combine(ContentPackage.LocalModsDir, unspecifiedFileName.Value, $"{unspecifiedFileName}.sub");
3064 loadedSub.Info.Name = unspecifiedFileName.Value;
3065 try
3066 {
3067 loadedSub.Info.Name = loadedSub.Info.SubmarineElement.GetAttributeString("name", loadedSub.Info.Name);
3068 }
3069 catch (Exception e)
3070 {
3071 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to find a name for the submarine.", e);
3072 }
3073 MainSub = loadedSub;
3074 MainSub.SetPrevTransform(MainSub.Position);
3075 MainSub.UpdateTransform();
3076 MainSub.Info.Name = loadedSub.Info.Name;
3077 subNameLabel.Text = ToolBox.LimitString(loadedSub.Info.Name, subNameLabel.Font, subNameLabel.Rect.Width);
3078
3079 CreateDummyCharacter();
3080
3081 cam.Position = MainSub.Position + MainSub.HiddenSubPosition;
3082
3083 loadFrame = null;
3084 }

3147 private static RegularPackage GetContentPackageIntrinsicallyTiedToSub(SubmarineInfo sub)
3148 => ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Regular
3149 .Where(p => p.Files.Length == 1)
3150 .FirstOrDefault(regularPackage => regularPackage.Files[0].Path == sub.FilePath);
3151
3152 private void TryDeleteSub(SubmarineInfo sub)
3153 {
3154 if (sub == null) { return; }
3155
3156 //If the sub is included in a content package that only defines that one sub,
3157 //check that it's a local content package and only allow deletion if it is.
3158 //(deleting from the Submarines folder is also currently allowed, but this is temporary)
3159 var subPackage = GetContentPackageIntrinsicallyTiedToSub(sub);
3160 if (!ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Regular.Contains(subPackage)) { return; }
3161
3162 var msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(
3163 TextManager.Get("DeleteDialogLabel"),
3164 TextManager.GetWithVariable("DeleteDialogQuestion", "[file]", sub.Name),
3165 new LocalizedString[] { TextManager.Get("Yes"), TextManager.Get("Cancel") });
3166 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked += (btn, userData) =>
3167 {
3168 try
3169 {
3170 if (subPackage != null)
3171 {
3172 Directory.Delete(Path.GetDirectoryName(subPackage.Path), recursive: true);
3173 ContentPackageManager.LocalPackages.Refresh();
3174 ContentPackageManager.EnabledPackages.DisableRemovedMods();
3175 }
3176
3177 sub.Dispose();
3178 CreateLoadScreen();
3179 }
3180 catch (Exception e)
3181 {
3182 DebugConsole.ThrowError(TextManager.GetWithVariable("DeleteFileError", "[file]", sub.FilePath), e);
3183 }
3184 return true;
3185 };
3186 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked += msgBox.Close;
3187 msgBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked += msgBox.Close;
3188 }

3263 (!selectedCategory.HasValue || ((MapEntityPrefab)child.UserData).Category.HasFlag(selectedCategory)) &&

3315 private void CreateContextMenu()
3316 {
3317 if (GUIContextMenu.CurrentContextMenu != null) { return; }
3318
3319 List<MapEntity> targets = MapEntity.mapEntityList.Any(me => me.IsHighlighted && !MapEntity.SelectedList.Contains(me)) ?
3320 MapEntity.mapEntityList.Where(me => me.IsHighlighted).ToList() :
3321 new List<MapEntity>(MapEntity.SelectedList);
3322
3323 Item target = null;
3324
3325 var single = targets.Count == 1 ? targets.Single() : null;
3326 if (single is Item item && item.Components.Any(ic => !(ic is ConnectionPanel) && !(ic is Repairable) && ic.GuiFrame != null))
3327 {
3328 // Do not offer the ability to open the inventory if the inventory should never be drawn
3329 var container = item.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();

3346 foreach (MapEntity match in MapEntity.mapEntityList.Where(e => e.Prefab != null && targets.Any(t => t.Prefab?.Identifier == e.Prefab.Identifier) && !MapEntity.SelectedList.Contains(e)))
3347 {
3348 if (MapEntity.SelectedList.Contains(match)) { continue; }

3432 private void CreateNewLayer(string name, List<MapEntity> content)
3433 {
3434 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(name))
3435 {
3436 name = TextManager.Get("editor.layer.newlayer").Value;
3437 }
3438
3439 string incrementedName = name;
3440
3441 for (int i = 1; Layers.ContainsKey(incrementedName); i++)
3442 {
3443 incrementedName = $"{name} ({i})";
3444 }
3445
3446 name = incrementedName;
3447
3448 if (content != null)
3449 {
3450 MoveToLayer(name, content);
3451 }
3452
3453 Layers.Add(name, LayerData.Default);
3454 UpdateLayerPanel();
3455 }
3456
3457 private void RenameLayer(string original, string newName)
3458 {
3459 Layers.Remove(original);
3460
3461 foreach (MapEntity entity in MapEntity.mapEntityList.Where(entity => entity.Layer == original))
3462 {
3463 entity.Layer = newName ?? string.Empty;
3464 }
3465
3466 if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(newName))
3467 {
3468 Layers.TryAdd(newName, LayerData.Default);
3469 }
3470 UpdateLayerPanel();
3471 }
3472
3473 private void ReconstructLayers()
3474 {
3475 ClearLayers();
3476 foreach (MapEntity entity in MapEntity.mapEntityList)
3477 {
3478 if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(entity.Layer))
3479 {
3480 Layers.TryAdd(entity.Layer, LayerData.Default);
3481 }
3482 }
3483 UpdateLayerPanel();
3484 }
3485
3486 private void ClearLayers()
3487 {
3488 Layers.Clear();
3489 UpdateLayerPanel();
3490 }

3492 private void PasteAssembly(string text = null, Vector2? pos = null)
3493 {
3494 pos ??= cam.ScreenToWorld(PlayerInput.MousePosition);
3495 text ??= Clipboard.GetText();
3496 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(text))
3497 {
3498 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Unable to paste assembly: Clipboard content is empty.");
3499 return;
3500 }
3501
3502 XElement element = null;
3503
3504 try
3505 {
3506 element = XDocument.Parse(text).Root;
3507 }
3508 catch (Exception) { /* ignored */ }
3509
3510 if (element == null)
3511 {
3512 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Unable to paste assembly: Clipboard content is not valid XML.");
3513 return;
3514 }
3515
3516 Submarine sub = MainSub;
3517 List<MapEntity> entities;
3518 try
3519 {
3520 entities = ItemAssemblyPrefab.PasteEntities(pos.Value, sub, element, selectInstance: true);
3521 }
3522 catch (Exception e)
3523 {
3524 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Unable to paste assembly: Failed to load items.", e);
3525 return;
3526 }
3527
3528 if (!entities.Any()) { return; }
3529 StoreCommand(new AddOrDeleteCommand(entities, false, handleInventoryBehavior: false));
3530 }
3531
3532 public static GUIMessageBox CreatePropertyColorPicker(Color originalColor, SerializableProperty property, ISerializableEntity entity)
3533 {
3534 var entities = new List<(ISerializableEntity Entity, Color OriginalColor, SerializableProperty Property)> { (entity, originalColor, property) };
3535
3536 foreach (ISerializableEntity selectedEntity in MapEntity.SelectedList.Where(selectedEntity => selectedEntity is ISerializableEntity && entity != selectedEntity).Cast<ISerializableEntity>())
3537 {
3538 switch (entity)
3539 {
3540 case ItemComponent _ when selectedEntity is Item item:
3541 foreach (var component in item.Components)
3542 {
3543 if (component.GetType() == entity.GetType() && component != entity)
3544 {
3545 entities.Add((component, (Color) property.GetValue(component), property));
3546 }
3547 }
3548 break;
3549 default:
3550 if (selectedEntity.GetType() == entity.GetType())
3551 {
3552 entities.Add((selectedEntity, (Color) property.GetValue(selectedEntity), property));
3553 }
3554 else if (selectedEntity is { SerializableProperties: { } props} )
3555 {
3556 if (props.TryGetValue(property.Name.ToIdentifier(), out SerializableProperty foundProp))
3557 {
3558 entities.Add((selectedEntity, (Color) foundProp.GetValue(selectedEntity), foundProp));
3559 }
3560 }
3561 break;
3562 }
3563 }

3714 Color SetColor(object source)
3715 {
3716 if (setValues)
3717 {
3718 setValues = false;
3719
3720 if (source == sliderMutex)
3721 {
3722 Vector3 hsv = new Vector3(hueScrollBar.BarScroll * 360f, satScrollBar.BarScroll, valueScrollBar.BarScroll);
3723 SetSliderTexts(hsv);
3724 SetColorPicker(hsv);
3725 SetHex(hsv);
3726 }
3727 else if (source == sliderTextMutex)
3728 {
3729 Vector3 hsv = new Vector3(hueTextBox.FloatValue * 360f, satTextBox.FloatValue, valueTextBox.FloatValue);
3730 SetSliders(hsv);
3731 SetColorPicker(hsv);
3732 SetHex(hsv);
3733 }
3734 else if (source == pickerMutex)
3735 {
3736 Vector3 hsv = new Vector3(colorPicker.SelectedHue, colorPicker.SelectedSaturation, colorPicker.SelectedValue);
3737 SetSliders(hsv);
3738 SetSliderTexts(hsv);
3739 SetHex(hsv);
3740 }
3741 else if (source == hexMutex)
3742 {
3743 Vector3 hsv = ToolBox.RGBToHSV(XMLExtensions.ParseColor(hexValueBox.Text, errorMessages: false));
3744 if (float.IsNaN(hsv.X)) { hsv.X = 0f; }
3745 SetSliders(hsv);
3746 SetSliderTexts(hsv);
3747 SetColorPicker(hsv);
3748 SetHex(hsv);
3749 }
3750
3751 setValues = true;
3752 }
3753
3754 Color color = ToolBox.HSVToRGB(colorPicker.SelectedHue, colorPicker.SelectedSaturation, colorPicker.SelectedValue);
3755 foreach (var (e, origColor, prop) in entities)
3756 {
3757 if (e is MapEntity { Removed: true }) { continue; }
3758 color.A = origColor.A;
3759 prop.TrySetValue(e, color);
3760 }
3761 return color;
3762
3763 void SetSliders(Vector3 hsv)
3764 {
3765 hueScrollBar.BarScroll = hsv.X / 360f;
3766 satScrollBar.BarScroll = hsv.Y;
3767 valueScrollBar.BarScroll = hsv.Z;
3768 }
3769
3770 void SetSliderTexts(Vector3 hsv)
3771 {
3772 hueTextBox.FloatValue = hsv.X / 360f;
3773 satTextBox.FloatValue = hsv.Y;
3774 valueTextBox.FloatValue = hsv.Z;
3775 }
3776
3777 void SetColorPicker(Vector3 hsv)
3778 {
3779 bool hueChanged = !MathUtils.NearlyEqual(colorPicker.SelectedHue, hsv.X);
3780 colorPicker.SelectedHue = hsv.X;
3781 colorPicker.SelectedSaturation = hsv.Y;
3782 colorPicker.SelectedValue = hsv.Z;
3783 if (hueChanged) { colorPicker.RefreshHue(); }
3784 }
3785
3786 void SetHex(Vector3 hsv)
3787 {
3788 Color hexColor = ToolBox.HSVToRGB(hsv.X, hsv.Y, hsv.Z);
3789 hexValueBox!.Text = ColorToHex(hexColor);
3790 }
3791 }
3792
3793 static string ColorToHex(Color color) => $"#{(color.R << 16 | color.G << 8 | color.B):X6}";
3794 }

3841 private bool SelectWire(GUIComponent component, object userData)
3842 {
3843 if (dummyCharacter == null) return false;
3844
3845 //if the same type of wire has already been selected, deselect it and return
3846 Item existingWire = dummyCharacter.HeldItems.FirstOrDefault(i => i.Prefab == userData as ItemPrefab);
3847 if (existingWire != null)
3848 {
3849 existingWire.Drop(null);
3850 existingWire.Remove();
3851 return false;
3852 }
3853
3854 var wire = new Item(userData as ItemPrefab, Vector2.Zero, null);
3855
3856 int slotIndex = dummyCharacter.Inventory.FindLimbSlot(InvSlotType.LeftHand);
3857
3858 //if there's some other type of wire in the inventory, remove it
3859 existingWire = dummyCharacter.Inventory.GetItemAt(slotIndex);
3860 if (existingWire != null && existingWire.Prefab != userData as ItemPrefab)
3861 {
3862 existingWire.Drop(null);
3863 existingWire.Remove();
3864 }
3865
3866 dummyCharacter.Inventory.TryPutItem(wire, slotIndex, false, false, dummyCharacter);
3867
3868 return true;
3869
3870 }
3871
3876 private void OpenItem(Item itemContainer)
3877 {
3878 if (dummyCharacter == null || itemContainer == null) { return; }
3879
3880 if (((itemContainer.GetComponent<Holdable>() is { } holdable && !holdable.Attached) || itemContainer.GetComponent<Wearable>() != null) && itemContainer.GetComponent<ItemContainer>() != null)
3881 {
3882 // We teleport our dummy character to the item so it appears as the entity stays still when in reality the dummy is holding it
3883 oldItemPosition = itemContainer.SimPosition;
3884 TeleportDummyCharacter(oldItemPosition);
3885
3886 // Override this so we can be sure the container opens
3887 var container = itemContainer.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
3888 if (container != null) { container.KeepOpenWhenEquipped = true; }
3889
3890 // We accept any slots except "Any" since that would take priority
3891 List<InvSlotType> allowedSlots = new List<InvSlotType>();
3892 itemContainer.AllowedSlots.ForEach(type =>
3893 {
3894 if (type != InvSlotType.Any) { allowedSlots.Add(type); }
3895 });
3896
3897 // Try to place the item in the dummy character's inventory
3898 bool success = dummyCharacter.Inventory.TryPutItem(itemContainer, dummyCharacter, allowedSlots);
3899 if (success) { OpenedItem = itemContainer; }
3900 else { return; }
3901 }
3902 MapEntity.SelectedList.Clear();
3903 MapEntity.FilteredSelectedList.Clear();
3904 MapEntity.SelectEntity(itemContainer);
3905 dummyCharacter.SelectedConstruction = itemContainer;
3906 FilterEntities(entityFilterBox.Text);
3907 }
3908
3912 private void CloseItem()
3913 {
3914 if (dummyCharacter == null) { return; }
3915 //nothing to close -> return
3916 if (DraggedItemPrefab == null && dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction == null && OpenedItem == null) { return; }
3917 DraggedItemPrefab = null;
3918 dummyCharacter.SelectedConstruction = null;
3919 OpenedItem?.Drop(dummyCharacter);
3920 OpenedItem?.SetTransform(oldItemPosition, 0f);
3921 OpenedItem = null;
3922 FilterEntities(entityFilterBox.Text);
3923 }

3933 foreach (Limb limb in dummyCharacter.AnimController.Limbs)
3934 {
3935 limb.body.SetTransform(pos, 0.0f);
3936 }
3937 dummyCharacter.AnimController.Collider.SetTransform(pos, 0);
3938 }
3939 }

3973 private bool SelectPrefab(GUIComponent component, object obj)
3974 {
3975 allEntityList.Deselect();
3976 categorizedEntityList.Deselect();
3977 if (GUI.MouseOn is GUIButton || GUI.MouseOn?.Parent is GUIButton) { return false; }
3978
3979 AddPreviouslyUsed(obj as MapEntityPrefab);
3980
3981 //if selecting a gap/hull/waypoint/spawnpoint, make sure the visibility is toggled on
3982 if (obj is CoreEntityPrefab prefab)
3983 {
3984 var matchingTickBox = showEntitiesTickBoxes.Find(tb => tb.UserData as string == prefab.Identifier);
3985 if (matchingTickBox != null && !matchingTickBox.Selected)
3986 {
3987 previouslyUsedPanel.Visible = false;
3988 showEntitiesPanel.Visible = true;
3989 showEntitiesPanel.RectTransform.AbsoluteOffset = new Point(Math.Max(entityCountPanel.Rect.Right, saveAssemblyFrame.Rect.Right), TopPanel.Rect.Height);
3990 matchingTickBox.Selected = true;
3991 matchingTickBox.Flash(GUIStyle.Green);
3992 }
3993 }
3994
3995 if (dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction != null)
3996 {
3997 var inv = dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction?.OwnInventory;
3998 if (inv != null)
3999 {
4000 switch (obj)
4001 {
4002 case ItemAssemblyPrefab assemblyPrefab when PlayerInput.IsShiftDown():
4003 {
4004 var itemInstance = LoadItemAssemblyInventorySafe(assemblyPrefab);
4005 var spawnedItem = false;
4006
4007 itemInstance.ForEach(newItem =>
4008 {
4009 if (newItem != null)
4010 {
4011 var placedItem = inv.TryPutItem(newItem, dummyCharacter);
4012 spawnedItem |= placedItem;
4013
4014 if (!placedItem)
4015 {
4016 // Remove everything inside of the item so we don't get the popup asking if we want to keep the contained items
4017 newItem.OwnInventory?.DeleteAllItems();
4018 newItem.Remove();
4019 }
4020 }
4021 });
4022
4023 List<MapEntity> placedEntities = itemInstance.Where(it => !it.Removed).Cast<MapEntity>().ToList();
4024 if (placedEntities.Any())
4025 {
4026 StoreCommand(new AddOrDeleteCommand(placedEntities, false));
4027 }
4028 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(spawnedItem ? GUISoundType.PickItem : GUISoundType.PickItemFail);
4029 break;
4030 }
4031 case ItemPrefab itemPrefab when PlayerInput.IsShiftDown():
4032 {
4033 var item = new Item(itemPrefab, Vector2.Zero, MainSub);
4034 if (!inv.TryPutItem(item, dummyCharacter))
4035 {
4036 // We failed, remove the item so it doesn't stay at x:0,y:0
4037 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(GUISoundType.PickItemFail);
4038 item.Remove();
4039 }
4040 else
4041 {
4042 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(GUISoundType.PickItem);
4043 }
4044
4045 if (!item.Removed)
4046 {
4047 StoreCommand(new AddOrDeleteCommand(new List<MapEntity> { item }, false));
4048 }
4049 break;
4050 }
4051 case ItemAssemblyPrefab _:
4052 case ItemPrefab _:
4053 {
4054 // Place the item into our hands
4055 DraggedItemPrefab = (MapEntityPrefab)obj;
4056 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(GUISoundType.PickItem);
4057 break;
4058 }
4059 }
4060 }
4061 }
4062 else
4063 {
4064 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(GUISoundType.PickItem);
4065 MapEntityPrefab.SelectPrefab(obj);
4066 }
4067
4068 return false;
4069 }

4092 ToolBox.LimitString(mapEntityPrefab.Name.Value, GUIStyle.SmallFont, previouslyUsedList.Content.Rect.Width), font: GUIStyle.SmallFont)

4098
4099 public void AutoHull()
4100 {
4101 for (int i = 0; i < MapEntity.mapEntityList.Count; i++)
4102 {
4103 MapEntity h = MapEntity.mapEntityList[i];
4104 if (h is Hull || h is Gap)
4105 {
4106 h.Remove();
4107 i--;
4108 }
4109 }
4110
4111 List<Vector2> wallPoints = new List<Vector2>();
4112 Vector2 max;
4113
4114 List<MapEntity> mapEntityList = new List<MapEntity>();
4115
4116 foreach (MapEntity e in MapEntity.mapEntityList)
4117 {
4118 if (e is Item it)
4119 {
4120 Door door = it.GetComponent<Door>();
4121 if (door != null)
4122 {
4123 int halfW = it.WorldRect.Width / 2;
4124 wallPoints.Add(new Vector2(it.WorldRect.X + halfW, -it.WorldRect.Y + it.WorldRect.Height));
4125 mapEntityList.Add(it);
4126 }
4127 continue;
4128 }
4129
4130 if (!(e is Structure)) continue;
4131 Structure s = e as Structure;
4132 if (!s.HasBody) continue;
4133 mapEntityList.Add(e);
4134
4135 if (e.Rect.Width > e.Rect.Height)
4136 {
4137 int halfH = e.WorldRect.Height / 2;
4138 wallPoints.Add(new Vector2(e.WorldRect.X, -e.WorldRect.Y + halfH));
4139 wallPoints.Add(new Vector2(e.WorldRect.X + e.WorldRect.Width, -e.WorldRect.Y + halfH));
4140 }
4141 else
4142 {
4143 int halfW = e.WorldRect.Width / 2;
4144 wallPoints.Add(new Vector2(e.WorldRect.X + halfW, -e.WorldRect.Y));
4145 wallPoints.Add(new Vector2(e.WorldRect.X + halfW, -e.WorldRect.Y + e.WorldRect.Height));
4146 }
4147 }
4148
4149 if (wallPoints.Count < 4)
4150 {
4151 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Generating hulls for the submarine failed. Not enough wall structures to generate hulls.");
4152 return;
4153 }
4154
4155 var min = wallPoints[0];
4156 max = wallPoints[0];
4157 for (int i = 0; i < wallPoints.Count; i++)
4158 {
4159 min.X = Math.Min(min.X, wallPoints[i].X);
4160 min.Y = Math.Min(min.Y, wallPoints[i].Y);
4161 max.X = Math.Max(max.X, wallPoints[i].X);
4162 max.Y = Math.Max(max.Y, wallPoints[i].Y);
4163 }
4164
4165 List<Rectangle> hullRects = new List<Rectangle>
4166 {
4167 new Rectangle((int)min.X, (int)min.Y, (int)(max.X - min.X), (int)(max.Y - min.Y))
4168 };
4169 foreach (Vector2 point in wallPoints)
4170 {
4171 MathUtils.SplitRectanglesHorizontal(hullRects, point);
4172 MathUtils.SplitRectanglesVertical(hullRects, point);
4173 }
4174
4175 hullRects.Sort((a, b) =>
4176 {
4177 if (a.Y < b.Y) return -1;
4178 if (a.Y > b.Y) return 1;
4179 if (a.X < b.X) return -1;
4180 if (a.X > b.X) return 1;
4181 return 0;
4182 });
4183
4184 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count - 1; i++)
4185 {
4186 Rectangle rect = hullRects[i];
4187 if (hullRects[i + 1].Y > rect.Y) continue;
4188
4189 Vector2 hullRPoint = new Vector2(rect.X + rect.Width - 8, rect.Y + rect.Height / 2);
4190 Vector2 hullLPoint = new Vector2(rect.X, rect.Y + rect.Height / 2);
4191
4192 MapEntity container = null;
4193 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4194 {
4195 Rectangle entRect = e.WorldRect;
4196 entRect.Y = -entRect.Y;
4197 if (entRect.Contains(hullRPoint))
4198 {
4199 if (!entRect.Contains(hullLPoint)) container = e;
4200 break;
4201 }
4202 }
4203 if (container == null)
4204 {
4205 rect.Width += hullRects[i + 1].Width;
4206 hullRects[i] = rect;
4207 hullRects.RemoveAt(i + 1);
4208 i--;
4209 }
4210 }
4211
4212 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4213 {
4214 Rectangle entRect = e.WorldRect;
4215 if (entRect.Width < entRect.Height) continue;
4216 entRect.Y = -entRect.Y - 16;
4217 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count; i++)
4218 {
4219 Rectangle hullRect = hullRects[i];
4220 if (entRect.Intersects(hullRect))
4221 {
4222 if (hullRect.Y < entRect.Y)
4223 {
4224 hullRect.Height = Math.Max((entRect.Y + 16 + entRect.Height / 2) - hullRect.Y, hullRect.Height);
4225 hullRects[i] = hullRect;
4226 }
4227 else if (hullRect.Y + hullRect.Height <= entRect.Y + 16 + entRect.Height)
4228 {
4229 hullRects.RemoveAt(i);
4230 i--;
4231 }
4232 }
4233 }
4234 }
4235
4236 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4237 {
4238 Rectangle entRect = e.WorldRect;
4239 if (entRect.Width < entRect.Height) continue;
4240 entRect.Y = -entRect.Y;
4241 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count; i++)
4242 {
4243 Rectangle hullRect = hullRects[i];
4244 if (entRect.Intersects(hullRect))
4245 {
4246 if (hullRect.Y >= entRect.Y - 8 && hullRect.Y + hullRect.Height <= entRect.Y + entRect.Height + 8)
4247 {
4248 hullRects.RemoveAt(i);
4249 i--;
4250 }
4251 }
4252 }
4253 }
4254
4255 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count;)
4256 {
4257 Rectangle hullRect = hullRects[i];
4258 Vector2 point = new Vector2(hullRect.X+2, hullRect.Y+hullRect.Height/2);
4259 MapEntity container = null;
4260 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4261 {
4262 Rectangle entRect = e.WorldRect;
4263 entRect.Y = -entRect.Y;
4264 if (entRect.Contains(point))
4265 {
4266 container = e;
4267 break;
4268 }
4269 }
4270 if (container == null)
4271 {
4272 hullRects.RemoveAt(i);
4273 continue;
4274 }
4275
4276 while (hullRects[i].Y <= hullRect.Y)
4277 {
4278 i++;
4279 if (i >= hullRects.Count) break;
4280 }
4281 }
4282
4283 for (int i = hullRects.Count-1; i >= 0;)
4284 {
4285 Rectangle hullRect = hullRects[i];
4286 Vector2 point = new Vector2(hullRect.X+hullRect.Width-2, hullRect.Y+hullRect.Height/2);
4287 MapEntity container = null;
4288 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4289 {
4290 Rectangle entRect = e.WorldRect;
4291 entRect.Y = -entRect.Y;
4292 if (entRect.Contains(point))
4293 {
4294 container = e;
4295 break;
4296 }
4297 }
4298 if (container == null)
4299 {
4300 hullRects.RemoveAt(i); i--;
4301 continue;
4302 }
4303
4304 while (hullRects[i].Y >= hullRect.Y)
4305 {
4306 i--;
4307 if (i < 0) break;
4308 }
4309 }
4310
4311 hullRects.Sort((a, b) =>
4312 {
4313 if (a.X < b.X) return -1;
4314 if (a.X > b.X) return 1;
4315 if (a.Y < b.Y) return -1;
4316 if (a.Y > b.Y) return 1;
4317 return 0;
4318 });
4319
4320 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count - 1; i++)
4321 {
4322 Rectangle rect = hullRects[i];
4323 if (hullRects[i + 1].Width != rect.Width) continue;
4324 if (hullRects[i + 1].X > rect.X) continue;
4325
4326 Vector2 hullBPoint = new Vector2(rect.X + rect.Width / 2, rect.Y + rect.Height - 8);
4327 Vector2 hullUPoint = new Vector2(rect.X + rect.Width / 2, rect.Y);
4328
4329 MapEntity container = null;
4330 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4331 {
4332 Rectangle entRect = e.WorldRect;
4333 entRect.Y = -entRect.Y;
4334 if (entRect.Contains(hullBPoint))
4335 {
4336 if (!entRect.Contains(hullUPoint)) container = e;
4337 break;
4338 }
4339 }
4340 if (container == null)
4341 {
4342 rect.Height += hullRects[i + 1].Height;
4343 hullRects[i] = rect;
4344 hullRects.RemoveAt(i + 1);
4345 i--;
4346 }
4347 }
4348
4349 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count;i++)
4350 {
4351 Rectangle rect = hullRects[i];
4352 rect.Y -= 16;
4353 rect.Height += 32;
4354 hullRects[i] = rect;
4355 }
4356
4357 hullRects.Sort((a, b) =>
4358 {
4359 if (a.Y < b.Y) return -1;
4360 if (a.Y > b.Y) return 1;
4361 if (a.X < b.X) return -1;
4362 if (a.X > b.X) return 1;
4363 return 0;
4364 });
4365
4366 for (int i = 0; i < hullRects.Count; i++)
4367 {
4368 for (int j = i+1; j < hullRects.Count; j++)
4369 {
4370 if (hullRects[j].Y <= hullRects[i].Y) continue;
4371 if (hullRects[j].Intersects(hullRects[i]))
4372 {
4373 Rectangle rect = hullRects[i];
4374 rect.Height = hullRects[j].Y - rect.Y;
4375 hullRects[i] = rect;
4376 break;
4377 }
4378 }
4379 }
4380
4381 foreach (Rectangle rect in hullRects)
4382 {
4383 Rectangle hullRect = rect;
4384 hullRect.Y = -hullRect.Y;
4385 Hull newHull = new Hull(MapEntityPrefab.FindByIdentifier("hull".ToIdentifier()),
4386 hullRect,
4387 MainSub);
4388 }
4389
4390 foreach (MapEntity e in mapEntityList)
4391 {
4392 if (!(e is Structure)) continue;
4393 if (!(e as Structure).IsPlatform) continue;
4394
4395 Rectangle gapRect = e.WorldRect;
4396 gapRect.Y -= 8;
4397 gapRect.Height = 16;
4398 Gap newGap = new Gap(MapEntityPrefab.FindByIdentifier("gap".ToIdentifier()), gapRect);
4399 }
4400 }

4460 private static void Redo(int amount)
4461 {
4462 for (int i = 0; i < amount; i++)
4463 {
4464 if (commandIndex < Commands.Count)
4465 {
4466 Command command = Commands[commandIndex++];
4467 command.Execute();
4468 }
4469 }
4470 GameMain.SubEditorScreen.UpdateUndoHistoryPanel();
4471 }
4472
4473 private static void Undo(int amount)
4474 {
4475 for (int i = 0; i < amount; i++)
4476 {
4477 if (commandIndex > 0)
4478 {
4479 Command command = Commands[--commandIndex];
4480 command.UnExecute();
4481 }
4482 }
4483 GameMain.SubEditorScreen.UpdateUndoHistoryPanel();
4484 }
4485
4486 private static void ClearUndoBuffer()
4487 {
4488 SerializableEntityEditor.PropertyChangesActive = false;
4489 SerializableEntityEditor.CommandBuffer = null;
4490 Commands.ForEach(cmd => cmd.Cleanup());
4491 Commands.Clear();
4492 commandIndex = 0;
4493 GameMain.SubEditorScreen.UpdateUndoHistoryPanel();
4494 }
4495
4496 public static void StoreCommand(Command command)
4497 {
4498 if (commandIndex != Commands.Count)
4499 {
4500 Commands.RemoveRange(commandIndex, Commands.Count - commandIndex);
4501 }
4502 Commands.Add(command);
4503 commandIndex++;
4504
4505 // Start removing old commands
4506 if (Commands.Count > Math.Clamp(GameSettings.CurrentConfig.SubEditorUndoBuffer, 1, 10240))
4507 {
4508 Commands.First()?.Cleanup();
4509 Commands.RemoveRange(0, 1);
4510 commandIndex = Commands.Count;
4511 }
4512
4513 GameMain.SubEditorScreen.UpdateUndoHistoryPanel();
4514 }

4516 private void UpdateLayerPanel()

4518 if (layerPanel is null || layerList is null) { return; }
4519
4520 layerList.Content.ClearChildren();
4521

4523 GUILayoutGroup buttonHeaders = new GUILayoutGroup(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1f, 0.075f), layerList.Content.RectTransform), isHorizontal: true, childAnchor: Anchor.BottomLeft);
4524

4526 new GUIButton(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.15f, 1f), buttonHeaders.RectTransform), TextManager.Get("editor.layer.headerlink"), style: "GUIButtonSmallFreeScale") { ForceUpperCase = ForceUpperCase.Yes };

4528
4529 foreach (var (layer, (visibility, linkage)) in Layers)
4530 {

4534 };

4557 {
4558 Selected = linkage == LayerLinkage.Linked,
4559 OnSelected = box =>
4560 {

4562 {
4563 UpdateLayerPanel();
4564 return false;
4565 }
4566
4567 Layers[layer] = new LayerData(data.Visible, box.Selected ? LayerLinkage.Linked : LayerLinkage.Unlinked);
4568 return true;
4569 }
4570 };

4573

4575 {

4577 };

4580 layerChainLayout.Recalculate();
4581 layerVisibilityLayout.Recalculate();
4582 }

4585 buttonHeaders.Recalculate();
4586 foreach (var child in buttonHeaders.Children)
4587 {

4590 btn.Text = ToolBox.LimitString(btn.Text, btn.Font, btn.Rect.Width);
4591 if (originalBtnText != btn.Text)

4594 }

4630 private static void CommitBulkItemBuffer()
4631 {
4632 if (BulkItemBuffer.Any())
4633 {
4634 AddOrDeleteCommand master = BulkItemBuffer[0];
4635 for (int i = 1; i < BulkItemBuffer.Count; i++)
4636 {
4637 AddOrDeleteCommand command = BulkItemBuffer[i];
4638 command.MergeInto(master);
4639 }
4640
4641 StoreCommand(master);
4642 BulkItemBuffer.Clear();
4643 }
4644
4645 bulkItemBufferinUse = null;
4646 }

4653 {
4654 SkipInventorySlotUpdate = false;
4655 ImageManager.Update((float)deltaTime);
4656
4657 if (GameMain.GraphicsWidth != screenResolution.X || GameMain.GraphicsHeight != screenResolution.Y)

4659 saveFrame = null;

4673 {
4674 Wire equippedWire =
4675 Character.Controlled?.HeldItems.FirstOrDefault(it => it.GetComponent<Wire>() != null)?.GetComponent<Wire>() ??
4676 Wire.DraggingWire;

4682 {

4688 item.ExternalHighlight = GUI.IsMouseOn(child);
4689 }
4690 }

4694

4699 if (wire == null || !wire.IsMouseOn()) { continue; }
4700 highlightedEntities.Add(item);
4701 }
4702

4704 }

4710 snapToGridFrame.Visible = MapEntity.SelectedList.Count > 0;
4711
4712 var offset = cam.WorldView.Top - cam.ScreenToWorld(new Vector2(0, GameMain.GraphicsHeight - EntityMenu.Rect.Top)).Y;
4713

4715 if (camTargetFocus != Vector2.Zero)

4717 if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[InputType.Up].IsDown() || GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[InputType.Down].IsDown() ||
4718 GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[InputType.Left].IsDown() || GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[InputType.Right].IsDown())
4719 {
4720 camTargetFocus = Vector2.Zero;
4721 }
4722 else
4723 {
4724 var targetWithOffset = new Vector2(camTargetFocus.X, camTargetFocus.Y - offset / 2);
4725 if (Math.Abs(cam.Position.X - targetWithOffset.X) < 1.0f &&
4726 Math.Abs(cam.Position.Y - targetWithOffset.Y) < 1.0f)
4727 {
4728 camTargetFocus = Vector2.Zero;
4729 }
4730 else
4731 {
4732 cam.Position += (targetWithOffset - cam.Position) / cam.MoveSmoothness;
4733 }
4734 }
4735 }
4736
4737 if (undoBufferPanel.Visible)
4738 {
4739 undoBufferList.Deselect();
4740 }
4741
4742 if (GUI.KeyboardDispatcher.Subscriber == null
4743 || MapEntity.EditingHUD != null
4744 && GUI.KeyboardDispatcher.Subscriber is GUIComponent sub
4745 && MapEntity.EditingHUD.Children.Contains(sub))
4746 {

4751 // Ctrl+Shift+Z redos while Ctrl+Z undos

4759 }

4802 break;

4859 // Save menu

4946 if (!WiringMode)

4950 dummyCharacter.Inventory.visualSlots.ForEach(slot =>
4951 {
4952 slot.Rect.Y = EntityMenu.Rect.Top;
4953 slot.Rect.X = EntityMenu.Rect.X + (EntityMenu.Rect.Width / 2) - (slot.Rect.Width /2);
4954 });
4955 }

4963 if (equippedWire != null && equippedWire.GetNodes().Count > 0)
4964 {
4965 Vector2 lastNode = equippedWire.GetNodes().Last();
4966 if (equippedWire.Item.Submarine != null)
4967 {

4969 }

5004 }
5005
5006 // Deposit item from our "infinite stack" into inventory slots
5007 var inv = dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction?.OwnInventory;
5008 if (inv?.visualSlots != null && !PlayerInput.IsCtrlDown())
5009 {
5010 var dragginMouse = MouseDragStart != Vector2.Zero && Vector2.Distance(PlayerInput.MousePosition, MouseDragStart) >= GUI.Scale * 20;
5011
5012 // So we don't accidentally drag inventory items while doing this
5013 if (DraggedItemPrefab != null) { Inventory.DraggingItems.Clear(); }
5014
5015 switch (DraggedItemPrefab)
5016 {
5017 // regular item prefabs
5018 case ItemPrefab itemPrefab when PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonClicked() || dragginMouse:
5019 {
5020 bool spawnedItem = false;
5021 for (var i = 0; i < inv.Capacity; i++)
5022 {
5023 var slot = inv.visualSlots[i];
5024 var itemContainer = inv.GetItemAt(i)?.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
5025
5026 // check if the slot is empty or if we can place the item into a container, for example an oxygen tank into a diving suit
5027 if (Inventory.IsMouseOnSlot(slot))
5028 {
5029 var newItem = new Item(itemPrefab, Vector2.Zero, MainSub);
5030
5031 if (inv.CanBePutInSlot(itemPrefab, i, condition: null))
5032 {
5033 bool placedItem = inv.TryPutItem(newItem, i, false, true, dummyCharacter);
5034 spawnedItem |= placedItem;
5035
5036 if (!placedItem)
5037 {
5038 newItem.Remove();
5039 }
5040 }
5041 else if (itemContainer != null && itemContainer.Inventory.CanBePut(itemPrefab))
5042 {
5043 bool placedItem = itemContainer.Inventory.TryPutItem(newItem, dummyCharacter);
5044 spawnedItem |= placedItem;
5045
5046 // try to place the item into the inventory of the item we are hovering over
5047 if (!placedItem)
5048 {
5049 newItem.Remove();
5050 }
5051 else
5052 {
5053 slot.ShowBorderHighlight(GUIStyle.Green, 0.1f, 0.4f);
5054 }
5055 }
5056 else
5057 {
5058 newItem.Remove();
5059 slot.ShowBorderHighlight(GUIStyle.Red, 0.1f, 0.4f);
5060 }
5061
5062 if (!newItem.Removed)
5063 {
5064 BulkItemBufferInUse = ItemAddMutex;
5065 BulkItemBuffer.Add(new AddOrDeleteCommand(new List<MapEntity> { newItem }, false));
5066 }
5067
5068 if (!dragginMouse)
5069 {
5070 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(spawnedItem ? GUISoundType.PickItem : GUISoundType.PickItemFail);
5071 }
5072 }
5073 }
5074 break;
5075 }
5076 // item assemblies
5077 case ItemAssemblyPrefab assemblyPrefab when PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonClicked():
5078 {
5079 bool spawnedItems = false;
5080 for (var i = 0; i < inv.visualSlots.Length; i++)
5081 {
5082 var slot = inv.visualSlots[i];
5083 var item = inv?.GetItemAt(i);
5084 var itemContainer = item?.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
5085 if (item == null && Inventory.IsMouseOnSlot(slot))
5086 {
5087 // load the items
5088 var itemInstance = LoadItemAssemblyInventorySafe(assemblyPrefab);
5089
5090 // counter for items that failed so we so we known that slot remained empty
5091 var failedCount = 0;
5092
5093 for (var j = 0; j < itemInstance.Count(); j++)
5094 {
5095 var newItem = itemInstance[j];
5096 var newSpot = i + j - failedCount;
5097
5098 // try to find a valid slot to put the items
5099 while (inv.visualSlots.Length > newSpot)
5100 {
5101 if (inv.GetItemAt(newSpot) == null) { break; }
5102 newSpot++;
5103 }
5104
5105 // valid slot found
5106 if (inv.visualSlots.Length > newSpot)
5107 {
5108 var placedItem = inv.TryPutItem(newItem, newSpot, false, true, dummyCharacter);
5109 spawnedItems |= placedItem;
5110
5111 if (!placedItem)
5112 {
5113 failedCount++;
5114 // delete the included items too so we don't get a popup asking if we want to keep them
5115 newItem?.OwnInventory?.DeleteAllItems();
5116 newItem.Remove();
5117 }
5118 }
5119 else
5120 {
5121 var placedItem = inv.TryPutItem(newItem, dummyCharacter);
5122 spawnedItems |= placedItem;
5123
5124 // if our while loop didn't find a valid slot then let the inventory decide where to put it as a last resort
5125 if (!placedItem)
5126 {
5127 // delete the included items too so we don't get a popup asking if we want to keep them
5128 newItem?.OwnInventory?.DeleteAllItems();
5129 newItem.Remove();
5130 }
5131 }
5132 }
5133
5134 List<MapEntity> placedEntities = itemInstance.Where(it => !it.Removed).Cast<MapEntity>().ToList();
5135 if (placedEntities.Any())
5136 {
5137 BulkItemBufferInUse = ItemAddMutex;
5138 BulkItemBuffer.Add(new AddOrDeleteCommand(placedEntities, false));
5139 }
5140 }
5141 }
5142
5143 SoundPlayer.PlayUISound(spawnedItems ? GUISoundType.PickItem : GUISoundType.PickItemFail);
5144 break;
5145 }
5146 }
5147 }
5148
5149 if (PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonReleased() && BulkItemBufferInUse != null)
5150 {
5151 CommitBulkItemBuffer();
5152 }
5153
5154 if (SerializableEntityEditor.PropertyChangesActive && (SerializableEntityEditor.NextCommandPush < DateTime.Now || MapEntity.EditingHUD == null))
5155 {
5156 SerializableEntityEditor.CommitCommandBuffer();
5157 }
5158
5159 // Update our mouse dragging state so we can easily slide thru slots while holding the mouse button down to place lots of items
5160 if (PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonHeld())
5161 {
5162 if (MouseDragStart == Vector2.Zero)
5163 {
5164 MouseDragStart = PlayerInput.MousePosition;
5165 }
5166 }
5167 else
5168 {
5169 MouseDragStart = Vector2.Zero;
5170 }
5171
5172 if (!saveAssemblyFrame.Rect.Contains(PlayerInput.MousePosition) && !snapToGridFrame.Rect.Contains(PlayerInput.MousePosition) &&
5173 dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction == null && !WiringMode && GUI.MouseOn == null)
5174 {
5175 if (layerList is { Visible: true } && GUI.KeyboardDispatcher.Subscriber == layerList)
5176 {
5177 GUI.KeyboardDispatcher.Subscriber = null;
5178 }
5179
5180 MapEntity.UpdateSelecting(cam);
5181 }
5182
5183 if (!PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonHeld())
5184 {
5185 MeasurePositionStart = Vector2.Zero;
5186 }
5187
5188 if (PlayerInput.KeyDown(Keys.LeftAlt) || PlayerInput.KeyDown(Keys.RightAlt))
5189 {
5190 if (PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonDown())
5191 {
5192 MeasurePositionStart = cam.ScreenToWorld(PlayerInput.MousePosition);
5193 }
5194 }
5195
5196 if (!WiringMode)
5197 {
5198 bool shouldCloseHud = dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction != null && HUD.CloseHUD(dummyCharacter.SelectedConstruction.Rect) && DraggedItemPrefab == null;
5199
5200 if (MapEntityPrefab.Selected != null && GUI.MouseOn == null)
5201 {
5202 MapEntityPrefab.Selected.UpdatePlacing(cam);
5203 }
5204 else
5205 {
5206 if (PlayerInput.SecondaryMouseButtonClicked() && !shouldCloseHud)
5207 {
5208 if (GUI.IsMouseOn(entityFilterBox))
5209 {
5210 ClearFilter();
5211 }
5212 else
5213 {
5214 if (dummyCharacter?.SelectedConstruction == null)
5215 {
5216 CreateContextMenu();
5217 }
5218 DraggedItemPrefab = null;
5219 }
5220 }
5221
5222 if (shouldCloseHud)
5223 {
5224 CloseItem();
5225 }
5226 }
5227 MapEntity.UpdateEditor(cam, (float)deltaTime);
5228 }
5229
5230 entityMenuOpenState = entityMenuOpen && !WiringMode ?
5231 (float)Math.Min(entityMenuOpenState + deltaTime * 5.0f, 1.0f) :
5232 (float)Math.Max(entityMenuOpenState - deltaTime * 5.0f, 0.0f);
5233
5234 EntityMenu.RectTransform.ScreenSpaceOffset = Vector2.Lerp(new Vector2(0.0f, EntityMenu.Rect.Height - 10), Vector2.Zero, entityMenuOpenState).ToPoint();
5235
5236 if (PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonClicked() && !GUI.IsMouseOn(entityFilterBox))
5237 {
5238 entityFilterBox.Deselect();
5239 }
5240
5241 if (loadFrame != null)
5242 {
5243 if (PlayerInput.SecondaryMouseButtonClicked())
5244 {
5245 loadFrame = null;
5246 }
5247 }
5248 else if (saveFrame != null)
5249 {
5250 if (PlayerInput.SecondaryMouseButtonClicked())
5251 {
5252 saveFrame = null;
5253 }
5254 }
5255
5256 if (dummyCharacter != null)
5257 {
5258 dummyCharacter.AnimController.FindHull(dummyCharacter.CursorWorldPosition, setSubmarine: false);
5259
5260 foreach (Item item in dummyCharacter.Inventory.AllItems)
5261 {
5262 item.SetTransform(dummyCharacter.SimPosition, 0.0f);
5263 item.UpdateTransform();
5264 item.SetTransform(item.body.SimPosition, 0.0f);
5265
5266 //wires need to be updated for the last node to follow the player during rewiring
5267 Wire wire = item.GetComponent<Wire>();
5268 wire?.Update((float)deltaTime, cam);
5269 }
5270
5271 if (dummyCharacter.SelectedConstruction != null)
5272 {
5273 if (MapEntity.SelectedList.Contains(dummyCharacter.SelectedConstruction) || WiringMode)
5274 {
5275 dummyCharacter.SelectedConstruction?.UpdateHUD(cam, dummyCharacter, (float)deltaTime);
5276 }
5277 else
5278 {
5279 // We somehow managed to unfocus the item, close it so our framerate doesn't go to 5 because the
5280 // UpdateHUD() method keeps re-creating the editing HUD
5281 CloseItem();
5282 }
5283 }
5284 else if (MapEntity.SelectedList.Count == 1 && WiringMode && MapEntity.SelectedList.FirstOrDefault() is Item item)
5285 {
5286 item.UpdateHUD(cam, dummyCharacter, (float)deltaTime);
5287 }
5288
5289 CharacterHUD.Update((float)deltaTime, dummyCharacter, cam);
5290 }
