5296 public override void Draw(double deltaTime, GraphicsDevice graphics, SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
5297 {
5298 cam.UpdateTransform();
5299 if (lightingEnabled)
5300 {
5301 GameMain.LightManager.RenderLightMap(graphics, spriteBatch, cam);
5302 }
5303
5304 foreach (Submarine sub in Submarine.Loaded)
5305 {
5306 sub.UpdateTransform();
5307 }
5308
5309 graphics.Clear(BackgroundColor);
5310
5311 ImageManager.Draw(spriteBatch, cam);
5312
5313 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.BackToFront, BlendState.NonPremultiplied, transformMatrix: cam.Transform);
5314
5315 if (GameMain.DebugDraw)
5316 {
5317 GUI.DrawLine(spriteBatch, new Vector2(MainSub.HiddenSubPosition.X, -cam.WorldView.Y), new Vector2(MainSub.HiddenSubPosition.X, -(cam.WorldView.Y - cam.WorldView.Height)), Color.White * 0.5f, 1.0f, (int)(2.0f / cam.Zoom));
5318 GUI.DrawLine(spriteBatch, new Vector2(cam.WorldView.X, -MainSub.HiddenSubPosition.Y), new Vector2(cam.WorldView.Right, -MainSub.HiddenSubPosition.Y), Color.White * 0.5f, 1.0f, (int)(2.0f / cam.Zoom));
5319 }
5320 Submarine.DrawBack(spriteBatch, true, e =>
5321 e is Structure s &&
5322 !IsSubcategoryHidden(e.Prefab?.Subcategory) &&
5323 (e.SpriteDepth >= 0.9f || s.Prefab.BackgroundSprite != null));
5324 Submarine.DrawPaintedColors(spriteBatch, true);
5325 spriteBatch.End();
5326
5327 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.BackToFront, BlendState.NonPremultiplied, transformMatrix: cam.Transform);
5328
5329 // When we "open" a wearable item with inventory it won't get rendered because the dummy character is invisible
5330 // So we are drawing a clone of it on the same position
5331 if (OpenedItem?.GetComponent<Wearable>() != null)
5332 {
5333 OpenedItem.Sprite.Draw(spriteBatch, new Vector2(OpenedItem.DrawPosition.X, -(OpenedItem.DrawPosition.Y)),
5334 scale: OpenedItem.Scale, color: OpenedItem.SpriteColor, depth: OpenedItem.SpriteDepth);
5335 GUI.DrawRectangle(spriteBatch,
5336 new Vector2(OpenedItem.WorldRect.X, -OpenedItem.WorldRect.Y),
5337 new Vector2(OpenedItem.Rect.Width, OpenedItem.Rect.Height),
5338 Color.White, false, 0, (int)Math.Max(2.0f / cam.Zoom, 1.0f));
5339 }
5340
5341 Submarine.DrawBack(spriteBatch, true, e =>
5342 (!(e is Structure) || e.SpriteDepth < 0.9f) &&
5343 !IsSubcategoryHidden(e.Prefab?.Subcategory));
5344 spriteBatch.End();
5345
5346 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.BackToFront, BlendState.NonPremultiplied, transformMatrix: cam.Transform);
5347 Submarine.DrawDamageable(spriteBatch, null, editing: true, e => !IsSubcategoryHidden(e.Prefab?.Subcategory));
5348 spriteBatch.End();
5349
5350 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.BackToFront, BlendState.NonPremultiplied, transformMatrix: cam.Transform);
5351 Submarine.DrawFront(spriteBatch, editing: true, e => !IsSubcategoryHidden(e.Prefab?.Subcategory));
5352 if (!WiringMode && !IsMouseOnEditorGUI())
5353 {
5354 MapEntityPrefab.Selected?.DrawPlacing(spriteBatch, cam);
5355 MapEntity.DrawSelecting(spriteBatch, cam);
5356 }
5357 if (dummyCharacter != null && WiringMode)
5358 {
5359 foreach (Item heldItem in dummyCharacter.HeldItems)
5360 {
5361 heldItem.Draw(spriteBatch, editing: false, back: true);
5362 }
5363 }
5364
5365 DrawGrid(spriteBatch);
5366 spriteBatch.End();
5367
5368 ImageManager.DrawEditing(spriteBatch, cam);
5369
5370 if (GameMain.LightManager.LightingEnabled && lightingEnabled)
5371 {
5372 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Deferred, Lights.CustomBlendStates.Multiplicative, null, DepthStencilState.None);
5373 spriteBatch.Draw(GameMain.LightManager.LightMap, new Rectangle(0, 0, GameMain.GraphicsWidth, GameMain.GraphicsHeight), Color.White);
5374 spriteBatch.End();
5375 }
5376
5377 //-------------------- HUD -----------------------------
5378
5379 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Deferred, samplerState: GUI.SamplerState);
5380
5381 if (MainSub != null && cam.Zoom < 5f)
5382 {
5383 Vector2 position = MainSub.SubBody != null ? MainSub.WorldPosition : MainSub.HiddenSubPosition;
5384
5385 GUI.DrawIndicator(
5386 spriteBatch, position, cam,
5387 cam.WorldView.Width,
5388 GUIStyle.SubmarineLocationIcon.Value.Sprite, Color.LightBlue * 0.5f);
5389 }
5390
5391 var notificationIcon = GUIStyle.GetComponentStyle("GUINotificationButton");
5392 var tooltipStyle = GUIStyle.GetComponentStyle("GUIToolTip");
5393 foreach (Gap gap in Gap.GapList)
5394 {
5395 if (gap.linkedTo.Count == 2 && gap.linkedTo[0] == gap.linkedTo[1])
5396 {
5397 Vector2 screenPos = Cam.WorldToScreen(gap.WorldPosition);
5398 Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(screenPos.ToPoint() - new Point(20), new Point(40));
5399 tooltipStyle.Sprites[GUIComponent.ComponentState.None][0].Draw(spriteBatch, rect, Color.White);
5400 notificationIcon.Sprites[GUIComponent.ComponentState.None][0].Draw(spriteBatch, rect, GUIStyle.Orange);
5401 if (Vector2.Distance(PlayerInput.MousePosition, screenPos) < 30 * Cam.Zoom)
5402 {
5403 GUIComponent.DrawToolTip(spriteBatch, TextManager.Get("gapinsidehullwarning"), new Rectangle(screenPos.ToPoint(), new Point(10)));
5404 }
5405 }
5406 }
5407
5408 if (dummyCharacter != null)
5409 {
5410 if (WiringMode)
5411 {
5412 dummyCharacter.DrawHUD(spriteBatch, cam, false);
5413 wiringToolPanel.DrawManually(spriteBatch);
5414 }
5415 }
5416 MapEntity.DrawEditor(spriteBatch, cam);
5417
5418 GUI.Draw(Cam, spriteBatch);
5419
5420 if (MeasurePositionStart != Vector2.Zero)
5421 {
5422 Vector2 startPos = MeasurePositionStart;
5423 Vector2 mouseWorldPos = cam.ScreenToWorld(PlayerInput.MousePosition);
5424 if (PlayerInput.IsShiftDown())
5425 {
5426 startPos = RoundToGrid(startPos);
5427 mouseWorldPos = RoundToGrid(mouseWorldPos);
5428
5429 static Vector2 RoundToGrid(Vector2 position)
5430 {
5431 position.X = (float) Math.Round(position.X / Submarine.GridSize.X) * Submarine.GridSize.X;
5432 position.Y = (float) Math.Round(position.Y / Submarine.GridSize.Y) * Submarine.GridSize.Y;
5433 return position;
5434 }
5435 }
5436
5437 GUI.DrawLine(spriteBatch, cam.WorldToScreen(startPos), cam.WorldToScreen(mouseWorldPos), GUIStyle.Green, width: 4);
5438
5439 decimal realWorldDistance = decimal.Round((decimal) (Vector2.Distance(startPos, mouseWorldPos) * Physics.DisplayToRealWorldRatio), 2);
5440
5441 Vector2 offset = new Vector2(GUI.IntScale(24));
5442 GUI.DrawString(spriteBatch, PlayerInput.MousePosition + offset, $"{realWorldDistance}m", GUIStyle.TextColorNormal, font: GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont, backgroundColor: Color.Black, backgroundPadding: 4);
5443 }
5444
5445 spriteBatch.End();
5446 }
5447
5448 private void CreateImage(int width, int height, System.IO.Stream stream)
5449 {
5450 MapEntity.SelectedList.Clear();
5451 foreach (MapEntity me in MapEntity.mapEntityList)
5452 {
5453 me.IsHighlighted = false;
5454 }
5455
5456 var prevScissorRect = GameMain.Instance.GraphicsDevice.ScissorRectangle;
5457
5458 Rectangle subDimensions = Submarine.MainSub.CalculateDimensions(onlyHulls: false);
5459 Vector2 viewPos = subDimensions.Center.ToVector2();
5460 float scale = Math.Min(width / (float)subDimensions.Width, height / (float)subDimensions.Height);
5461
5462 var viewMatrix = Matrix.CreateTranslation(new Vector3(width / 2.0f, height / 2.0f, 0));
5463 var transform = Matrix.CreateTranslation(
5464 new Vector3(-viewPos.X, viewPos.Y, 0)) *
5465 Matrix.CreateScale(new Vector3(scale, scale, 1)) *
5466 viewMatrix;
5467
5468 using (RenderTarget2D rt = new RenderTarget2D(
5469 GameMain.Instance.GraphicsDevice,
5470 width, height, false, SurfaceFormat.Color, DepthFormat.None))
5471 using (SpriteBatch spriteBatch = new SpriteBatch(GameMain.Instance.GraphicsDevice))
5472 {
5473 GameMain.Instance.GraphicsDevice.SetRenderTarget(rt);
5474 GameMain.Instance.GraphicsDevice.Clear(new Color(8, 13, 19));
5475
5476 spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.BackToFront, BlendState.NonPremultiplied, null, null, null, null, transform);
5477 Submarine.Draw(spriteBatch);
5478 Submarine.DrawFront(spriteBatch);
5479 Submarine.DrawDamageable(spriteBatch, null);
5480 spriteBatch.End();
5481
5482
5483 GameMain.Instance.GraphicsDevice.SetRenderTarget(null);
5484 rt.SaveAsPng(stream, width, height);
5485 }
5486
5487 //for some reason setting the rendertarget changes the size of the viewport
5488 //but it doesn't change back to default when setting it back to null
5489 GameMain.Instance.ResetViewPort();
5490 }
5491
5492 private static readonly Color gridBaseColor = Color.White * 0.1f;
5493
5494 private void DrawGrid(SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
5495 {
5496 // don't render at high zoom levels because it would just turn the screen white
5497 if (cam.Zoom < 0.5f || !ShouldDrawGrid) { return; }
5498
5499 var (gridX, gridY) = Submarine.GridSize;
5500
5501 int scale = Math.Max(1, GUI.IntScale(1));
5502 float zoom = cam.Zoom / 2f; // Don't ask
5503 float lineThickness = Math.Max(1, scale / zoom);
5504
5505 Color gridColor = gridBaseColor;
5506 if (cam.Zoom < 1.0f)
5507 {
5508 // fade the grid when zooming out
5509 gridColor *= Math.Max(0, (cam.Zoom - 0.5f) * 2f);
5510 }
5511
5512 Rectangle camRect = cam.WorldView;
5513
5514 for (float x = snapX(camRect.X); x < snapX(camRect.X + camRect.Width) + gridX; x += gridX)
5515 {
5516 spriteBatch.DrawLine(new Vector2(x, -camRect.Y), new Vector2(x, -(camRect.Y - camRect.Height)), gridColor, thickness: lineThickness);
5517 }
5518
5519 for (float y = snapY(camRect.Y); y >= snapY(camRect.Y - camRect.Height) - gridY; y -= Submarine.GridSize.Y)
5520 {
5521 spriteBatch.DrawLine(new Vector2(camRect.X, -y), new Vector2(camRect.Right, -y), gridColor, thickness: lineThickness);
5522 }
5523
5524 float snapX(int x) => (float) Math.Floor(x / gridX) * gridX;
5525 float snapY(int y) => (float) Math.Ceiling(y / gridY) * gridY;
5526 }
5527
5528 public void SaveScreenShot(int width, int height, string filePath)
5529 {
5530 System.IO.Stream stream = File.OpenWrite(filePath);
5531 CreateImage(width, height, stream);
5532 stream.Dispose();
5533 }
5534
5535 public bool IsSubcategoryHidden(string subcategory)
5536 {
5537 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(subcategory) || !hiddenSubCategories.ContainsKey(subcategory))
5538 {
5539 return false;
5540 }
5541 return hiddenSubCategories[subcategory];
5542 }
5543
5544 public static bool IsSubEditor() => Screen.Selected is SubEditorScreen && !Submarine.Unloading;
5545 public static bool IsWiringMode() => Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen && GameMain.SubEditorScreen.WiringMode && !Submarine.Unloading;
5546
5547 public static bool IsLayerVisible(MapEntity entity)
5548 {
5549 if (!IsSubEditor() || string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(entity.Layer)) { return true; }
5550
5551 if (!Layers.TryGetValue(entity.Layer, out LayerData data))
5552 {
5553 Layers.TryAdd(entity.Layer, LayerData.Default);
5554 return true;
5555 }
5556
5557 return data.Visible == LayerVisibility.Visible;
5558 }
5559
5560 public static bool IsLayerLinked(MapEntity entity)
5561 {
5562 if (!IsSubEditor() || string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(entity.Layer)) { return false; }
5563
5564 if (!Layers.TryGetValue(entity.Layer, out LayerData data))
5565 {
5566 Layers.TryAdd(entity.Layer, LayerData.Default);
5567 return true;
5568 }
5569
5570 return data.Linkage == LayerLinkage.Linked;
5571 }
5572
5573 public static ImmutableHashSet<MapEntity> GetEntitiesInSameLayer(MapEntity entity)
5574 {
5575 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(entity.Layer)) { return ImmutableHashSet<MapEntity>.Empty; }
5576 return MapEntity.mapEntityList.Where(me => me.Layer == entity.Layer).ToImmutableHashSet();
5577 }
5578 }
